get.description: This will check a person's Email address and Password sent via a signed Javascript Web Token

parameters.name: jwtoken
parameters.description: Validate Supplied detail inside JWT Payload and verify if a student like this exists

status.description: Outcome of the process is one of the following: "OK", "Error","SQLERROR"

message.description: Either an Error message or the persons Title, Surname and Firstnames if status is "OK"

primary.description: Is this the primary Email address

userType.description: Type of user. Valid values are "S"tudent, "P"ersonnel

userId.description: The actual persons ID number inside Integrator

post.description: This will check a person's Email address and Password sent via a signed Javascript Web Token

status.description: Outcome of the process is one of the following: "OK", "Error","SQLERROR"

message.description: Either an Error message or the persons Title, Surname and Firstnames if status is "OK"

primary.description: Is this the primary Email address

userType.description: Type of user. Valid values are "S"tudent, "P"ersonnel

userId.description: The actual persons ID number inside Integrator

get.description: Display Student School Subjects

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Supply the specific student number

parameters.name: q_matricType
parameters.description: The matric type under which the student took this subject. Legal values are stored in {SCODE3-1}, Table IBKMTP

parameters.name: q_matricDate
parameters.description: The year and month that these subjects were taken under. The format is 'YYYYMM' where 'YYYY' => Year of the exams (i.e. 2015) 'MM' => Month of the exam. Valid values are '01' to '12' identifying 'January, February, …'

matricType.description: The matric type under which the student took this subject. Legal values are stored in {SCODE3-1}, Table IBKMTP

matricDate.description: The year and month that these subjects were taken under. The format is 'YYYYMM' where 'YYYY' => Year of the exams (i.e. 2015) 'MM' => Month of the exam. Valid values are '01' to '12' identifying 'January, February, …'

subjCode.description: The subject code of the subject for the student. Valid Values are stored in {SCODE-3}, Table IBMMSB

subjDesc.description: The subject description of the subject for the student. Valid Values are stored in {SCODE-3}, Table IBMMSB

subjGrade.description: The Grade in which this subject was taken. Legal values are stored in {SCODE-6}, Table JCTMGD

subjSymb.description: The Final Symbol acquired in this subject

subjSymb9.description: The Previous years Symbol acquired for this subject.

subjSymbJ.description: The midyear symbol acquired for this subject.

get.description: This is to verify that the Application API process is loaded and available

dummy.description: Fixed entry containing a value of "X"

get.description: This will retrieve the actual school code information for the applicant

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Indicate the relevant version of security that you are running. Currently the only version available is "1.1"

parameters.name: timeKey
parameters.description: Indicate the current date-time stamp. Format YYYYMMDDHHMISS whith the hours being in 24-hour format

parameters.name: publKey
parameters.description: Indicate the Assigned Public key for this environment. Also remember there is a private key that will not form part of this payload.

parameters.name: authKey
parameters.description: Generate a new Authentication key, made up of the above as well as the private key.

get.description: This will retrieve the valid Qualification codes currently active in the syste,

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Indicate the relevant version of security that you are running. Currently the only version available is "1.1"

parameters.name: timeKey
parameters.description: Indicate the current date-time stamp. Format YYYYMMDDHHMISS whith the hours being in 24-hour format

parameters.name: publKey
parameters.description: Indicate the Assigned Public key for this environment. Also remember there is a private key that will not form part of this payload.

parameters.name: authKey
parameters.description: Generate a new Authentication key, made up of the above as well as the private key.

put.description: This request will take the supplied info and verify if this combination leads through to a student biographical record or not. The test will be done using a combination of all of the following fields (surname, first name, birthdate, id number). The query will not take the case of the fields into account. If only one record could be found for this combination and the student number in the system is the same as the supplied student number, then the process will return an “OK” as well as the correctly supplied student number. If only one record could be found for this combination and the supplied student number is zero, then the process will return and “OK” as well as the student number queried from the system. If either no records or multiple records are found for this combination, the process will return a status of “FAIL”. No further processing will be done

version.description: Indicate the relevant version of security that you are running. Currently the only version available is "1.1"

timeKey.description: Indicate the current date-time stamp. Format YYYYMMDDHHMISS whith the hours being in 24-hour format

publKey.description: Indicate the Assigned Public key for this environment. Also remember there is a private key that will not form part of this payload.

authKey.description: Generate a new Authentication key, made up of the above as well as the private key.

students.description: Supply the student information that needs to be checked

surname.description: Enter the full surname for the student. Value can be mixed-case

firstNames.description: Enter first name and any secondary names for the student. Value can be mixed-case.

birthDate.description: Enter the birthdate of the student.

iDNumber.description: Enter the ID Number for this student. PLEASE NOTE: Either ID number or Passport is mandatory

passportNbr.description: Enter the Passport Number for this student. PLEASE NOTE: Either ID number or Passport is mandatory

studentNumber.description: f this is a check to see if the student supplied a correct student number, then enter the known student number here. If this is a check to see if this student is a new entry at the institution, then supply a 0 (zero)

put.description: This request will take the bulk of the input and use that to create a set of application details for a student. Please note that all system validations and regulations must be adhered to before this entry and all of its data will be created

version.description: Supply the version of the security information. Currently only version "1.1" is available

timeKey.description: Supply an actual timestamp when this record is submitted. pattern: YYYYMMDDHHMISS

publKey.description: Supply the agreed upon Public key

studentNumber.description: The student number should normally be set to '0' (zero) for new applicants. Only use a student number if the student has previously been issued a student number at this institution. Alternately change the zero to the supplied student number if part of this process failed AFTER a new student number was issued. This student number will be supplied in the response of the initial request.

title.description: Enter the title for this student. Legal values are stored in {GCS-9}, Table GEVTIT

initials.description: Enter the initials for this student. Normally all uppercase characters only with separating commas

surname.description: Enter the surname for this student

fullNames.description: Enter all the names for this student. Please note that we use this field for all names, as there are not field catering for 'second…' names

preferredName.description: Enter the name that the student prefers to be addressed as

maidenName.description: Enter the maiden name for this student

birthDate.description: Enter the birth date for this student. The format of this date must be 'DD-MON-YYYY' where DD => Day of the month (between 01 and 31) MON => Month of the year (Example, JAN, FEB, MAR,APR, …) YYYY => Four digit year (Example 1994)

gender.description: Enter the gender for this student. Only allowable values are 'M' for male or 'F' for Female

iDNumber.description: Enter the ID number for this student. This field is normally set as mandatory for a South African citizen. In the case of a non-South African citizen, the system requires a Passport number and the ID number may be left empty.

homeLanguage.description: Enter the language that the students speaks at home. Legal values are stored in {GCS-6},Table GAMLNG

maritalStatus.description: Enter the current Marital status of this student. Legal values are: 'S' => Single, 'M' => Married, 'D' => Divorced, 'W' => Widow(er)

churchAffiliation.description: Enter the preferred church affiliation for this student. Legal values are stored in {GCS-8}, Table GAJCHR

populationGrp.description: Enter the population group for this student. Legal values are stored in {GCS-7}, Table GALEGR

citizenship.description: Enter the citizenship for this student. Legal values are stored in {GCS2-6}

passportNbr.description: Enter the Passport number for this student

citizenshipType.description: Enter the type of citizenship for the student. Legal values are stored in {NSCODE-3}, Table JSWUDA

countryOfOrigin.description: Enter the country from which this student originates. Legal values are stored in Table RBCTAB

domicileStudyPermit.description: Enter the country from which this student originates. Legal values are stored in Table RBCTAB

whereHeard.description: Indicate where the student has heard of this institution. Legal values are stored in {SCODE3-21}, Table IIUHRD

previousActivity.description: Enter the activity of the student in the previous year. Legal values are stored in {SCODE3-1}, Table IBJPAC

lastPostSchoolEd.description: Enter the last educational institution that the student attended. Legal values are stored in {GCS-2}, Table GADINS

needExemption.description: Enter if the student wants to apply for exemption on certain subjects. Legal Values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => No

preferredLanguage.description: Enter the preferred language of education and communication for the student. Legal values are 'E' => English, 'A' => Alternate Language

schoolCode.description: Enter the code for the last school for the student. Legal values are stored in {SCODE-1}, Table IBCSCH

schoolProvince.description: Enter the Exam Authority for the school province for the student. Legal values are stored in {SCODE-1}, Table IBIEAH

examNumber.description: Enter the Examination Number for the student

highestGrade.description: Enter the Highest grade that the student has achieved. This will be something like '11' or '12'

examYearMonth.description: Enter the year and month that the student has completed their school leaving exams. Format will be 'YYYYMM' where 'YYYY' => The year (Example 2015), 'MM' => The Month. Valid values are '01' to '12' identifying 'January, February, …'

matricType.description: Enter the MAIN matric type for the student. If not completed, the matric subject’s first matric type will be used. Legal values are stored in {SCODE3-1}, Table IBKMTP

matricSince2008.description: Indicate if student has marked anything in the 'Matric Before 2008' Valid values are 'Y', 'N'. Please Note: we are currently not doing anything with this field.

currentlyEmployed.description: Indicate if the student is currently employed. Legal Values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => Not employed

nbrYearsEmployed.description: Deprecated. Enter the number of years that the student is currently employed.

requireFinAssist.description: Indicate if student requires financial Assistance. Legal values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => No

requireResAccom.description: Indicate if this student requires residence accommodation. Legal values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => No

willbeUpgrading.description: Deprecated. Indicate if the student will be upgrading. Please note: we are currently not doing anything with this value. Valid values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => No

nsfasPCode.description: Enter the NSFAS Postal Code for the student. Legal values are stored in {GCS2-2}, Table IBVPOS

nsfasResType.description: Enter the NSFAS Indicator for the type or Residence during the students study period. Legal values are stored in Table FVXACT

caoNumber.description: Enter the Central applications Office reference number

suggestedStno.description: Enter a student number that you would like to suggest be assigned to any new Biographical records

runType.description: Hardcode 'U' for Update purposes. No other values will be allowed at this stage.

applicationDetails.description: This will store the actual application for enrolment information. Note: this tag must be used only Once per applicant. The Array is used once per application.

academicYear.description: Enter the academic year for this application process. Example 2015

choiceNumber.description: Enter the choice number for this application. This is typically a sequential number that increments per student, per year. Example 1, 2, …

qualCode.description: Enter the Course code for which this application is requested. Legal values are stored in {SACAD-13}

periodOfStudy.description: Enter the requested period of study for this application. Legal values are stored in {SCODE-30}, Table ITSPRS

offeringType.description: Enter the requested Offering Type for this application. Legal values are stored in {GCS-5}, Table GASOTP

blockCode.description: Enter the requested Block for this application. Legal values are stored in {SCODE2-1}, Table IIDABL

applicationType.description: Enter the type of application for this request. Legal values are stored in {SCAO1-25}, Table IUPASC

subjectGroup.description: Deprecated. Enter the subject Group code for this application. Please Note: Not used at this stage.

startDate.description: Enter the start date for this application. Please Note: Not used at this stage

endDate.description: Enter the end date for this application. Please Note: Not used at this stage.

paymentType.description: Enter the Type of Payment to be used. Legal Values are 'C' => Cash, 'T' => Terms

upgrading.description: Indicate if this Application should be upgraded. Please Note: Not used at this stage.

addressDetails.description: This is the area used to store any address information about the specific student. At least one entry must be supplied with the students Postal Address information, the rest is not mandatory. Please create a new Array for each entry (i.e. postal address, Residential address, Study Address, etc)

addressType.description: Hardcode One of the supplied address types for each specific address. Legal values are 'PA' => Postal Address, 'HA' => Home/residential Address, 'SA' => Study Address

line1.description: Enter the first line of the address in this field

line2.description: Enter any additional information in lines 2, 3 and 4. Please create the tag entry even if the value is empty.

line3.description: Enter any additional information in lines 2, 3 and 4. Please create the tag entry even if the value is empty.

line4.description: Enter any additional information in lines 2, 3 and 4. Please create the tag entry even if the value is empty.

postCode.description: Enter the Postal code for this address. Legal values are stored in {GCS2-2}, Table IBVPOS

contactDetails.description: This is the area used to store any communication information about the specific student. One array entry must be supplied for each communication Type (i.e. Cellphone, Email Address, etc.) Do NOT create any array entries for empty information. Do NOT create a contactdetails entry if no communications info is available

addressType.description: Hardcode one of the supplied communication/contact types for each specific address. Legal values are 'FT' => Fax Number,'HT' => Home Telephone Number,'WT' => Work Telephone Number,'CE' => Cellphone number,'ET' => Email Number

line1.description: Enter the actual value of the student for the corresponding communication type here.

subjectDetails.description: Create this tag once to identify any/all school leaving subject information stored for the student

matricType.description: Enter the matric type under which the student took this subject. Legal values are stored in {SCODE3-1}, Table IBKMTP

matricDate.description: Enter the year and month that these subjects were taken under. The format is 'YYYYMM' where 'YYYY' => Year of the exams (i.e. 2015) 'MM' => Month of the exam. Valid values are '01' to '12' identifying 'January, February, …'

subjCode.description: Enter the subject code of the subject for the student. Valid Values are stored in {SCODE-3}, Table IBMMSB

subjGrade.description: Enter the Grade in which this subject was taken. Legal values are stored in {SCODE-6}, Table JCTMGD

subjSymb.description: Enter the Final Symbol acquired in this subject

subjSymb9.description: Enter the Previous years Symbol acquired for this subject.

subjSymbJ.description: Enter the midyear symbol acquired for this subject.

tertiaryStudies.description: Create this tag once to identify any/all school leaving subject information stored for the student

startYear.description: Enter the start year for this study record. Example 2021

endYear.description: Enter the end year for this study record. Example 2022

institutionCode.description: Enter the institution where this record was studied. Legal values are stored in {GCS-2}, Table GADINS

degreeEnrolled.description: Enter the code to identify the degree for this entry. Free-Format

degreeAwarded.description: Indicate if this degree was awarded/conferred. Legal values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => No

studentNumber.description: Enter the student number for this student at the time of doing this degree. I.e. this is the student number (if known) at the Institution where this degree was studied. Note: This is a numeric value and cannot be greater than 9 digits.

medicalDetails.description: Create this tag once to identify any/all medical information. Note: Do not create this tag if there are no medical information stored

fundCode.description: Enter the fund code for the student. Legal values are stored in {NSCODE-2}, Table JQUSMF

fundRefNbr.description: Enter the reference number for the student.

relation.description: Enter the relation of the student to this person. Legal values are stored in {GCS-28}, Table GGPRSH

title.description: Enter the Title of this person. Legal values are stored in {GCS-9}, Table GEVTIT

initials.description: Enter the Initials of this person.

surname.description: Enter the Surname of this person.

iDNumber.description: Enter the ID Number of this person.

telephoneNbr.description: Enter the Contact telephone number for this person.

condition.description: Enter the medical condition of this person.

useWheelchair.description: Indicate if this person needs the use of a wheelchair. Legal values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => No

typeOfWheelchar.description: When Wheelchair is required, please specify what type of wheelchair. Legal values are 'M' => Manual, 'E' => Electrical

underAdminByCourt.description: Has this person been placed under court administration. Legal values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => No

underAdminDate.description: If the person has been placed under court administration, then please supply the date. Format DD-MON-YYYY

mentallyUnfit.description: Has a court order declare this person mentally unfit? Legal values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => No

unfitDate.description: If the person has been declared mentally unfit, then please supply the date. Format DD-MON-YYYY

extramuralActivities.description: Create this tag once to indicate that this student has some extra-mural activities. Do not include this tag if there are no information to capture

code.description: Enter the code for each activity. Legal values are stored in {NSCODE-1}, Table IBUCER

disabilities.description: Create this tag once to indicate that this student has some Disabilities. Do not include this tag if there are no information to capture

code.description: Enter the code for each disability. Legal values are stored in {GCS2-1}, Table IJKPDI

remark.description: Enter the remark to be stored

nextOfKinDetails.description: This is where all of the students Next of Kin information will be stored. Note: if no next of Kin information was supplied, then this tag and everything within it must not be created. Note: If one or more Next of Kin information was supplied, create Only One of these tags and repeat the tag once for each person (Mother, Father, Guardian, etc.)

personType.description: Hardcode one of the supplied types to indicate which next of kin member. Legal values are 'FATH' => Father, 'MOTH' => Mother, 'SFATH' =>Step-Father, 'SMOTH' => Step-Mother,'GUARD' => Guardian

addressType.description: Hardcode “NC” for all Next of Kin entries.

title.description: Enter the title for the above specified member

initials.description: Enter the Initials for the above specified member

surname.description: Enter the Surname for the above specified member

addressDetails.description: Use this tag to store the address of the above specified member. Note: if no address was specified, do not include this tag.

addressType.description: Hardcode One of the supplied address types for each specific address. Legal values are 'PA' => Postal Address, 'HA' => Home/residential Address, 'SA' => Study Address

line1.description: Enter the first line of the address in this field

line2.description: Enter any additional information in lines 2, 3 and 4. Please create the tag entry even if the value is empty.

line3.description: Enter any additional information in lines 2, 3 and 4. Please create the tag entry even if the value is empty.

line4.description: Enter any additional information in lines 2, 3 and 4. Please create the tag entry even if the value is empty.

postCode.description: Enter the Postal code for this address. Legal values are stored in {GCS2-2}, Table IBVPOS

contactDetails.description: Use this tag to store the communication/contact types of the above specified Member. Note: If no contact information was specified, do not include this tag.

addressType.description: Hardcode one of the supplied communication/contact types for each specific address. Legal values are 'FT' => Fax Number,'HT' => Home Telephone Number,'WT' => Work Telephone Number,'CE' => Cellphone number,'ET' => Email Number

line1.description: Enter the actual value of the student for the corresponding communication type here.

financialAssistance.description: Create this tag once to identify any/all information going towards the financial assistance entries. Do Not include this tag if there are no Financial assistance information

title.description: Enter the Title for the involved person/ This is typically a brother/sister/parent of the student.

initials.description: Enter the initials for the involved person.

firstNames.description: Enter the first names of the involved person.

relationship.description: Enter the relationship between this person and the student. Legal values are stored in {GCS-28}, Table GGPRSH

tertiaryLevel.description: Indicate if this person is currently studying on tertiary level. Legal values are 'Y' => Yes, 'N' => No

incomeType.description: Indicate the Type of Income that this person might be on. Legal values are stored on {FBNC-4}, Table IQVICT

contactSeqNumber.description: Enter a unique number to identify this person between any of the other persons in this group. i.e start at 1 and move on to 2,

iDNumber.description: Enter the ID number of this person.

occupation.description: Enter the Occupation of this person. Legal values are stored in {SCODE-21}, Table IBPOCC

academicYear.description: Enter the academic year for this student.

employer.description: Enter the Government Employer code where applicable

adminSheetDetails.description: Create this tag once to identify any/all information going towards the financial assistance entries. Do Not include this tag if there are no Financial assistance information

certCode.description: Enter the Code that will identify the specific admin entry. Legal values are stored in {NSCODE-1}, Table IBUCER

certInd.description: Enter the indicator status for this entry. Legal values are 'Y' => Yes , 'N' => No

remarks.description: Enter any specific remarks for this entry

put.description: This request will take Allow you to change the Offering type of an existing application record

version.description: Supply the version of the security information. Currently only version "1.1" is available

timeKey.description: Supply an actual timestamp when this record is submitted. pattern: YYYYMMDDHHMISS

publKey.description: Supply the agreed upon Public key

students.description: Supply the student's Offering type detail

choiceNumber.description: Indicate the choice number for this application. This is typically a sequential number that increments per student, per year. Example 1, 2, …

qualCode.description: indicate the qualification for this application choice

appStatus.description: Indicate the Admission Status for this entry

runType.description: Indicate if this is a 'T'rial run or an 'U'pdate run

put.description: This request will take Allow you to change the Admission Status of an existing application record

version.description: Supply the version of the security information. Currently only version "1.1" is available

timeKey.description: Supply an actual timestamp when this record is submitted. pattern: YYYYMMDDHHMISS

publKey.description: Supply the agreed upon Public key

students.description: Supply the student's Offering type detail

choiceNumber.description: Indicate the choice number for this application. This is typically a sequential number that increments per student, per year. Example 1, 2, …

qualCode.description: indicate the qualification for this application choice

appStatus.description: Indicate the Admission Status for this entry

runType.description: Indicate if this is a 'T'rial run or an 'U'pdate run

get.description: This will validate a specific person and supply the relevant roles

parameters.name: jwtoken
parameters.description: Validate Supplied detail inside JWT Payload and verify if a Person like this exists. Also returns all valid roles for this person

status.description: Return the status or outcome of the query

roles.description: List all active Roles for this person

sourceLst.description: List of all  relevant Faculty, Department or Campus codes

sourceCode.description: List all  relevant Faculty, Department or Campus codes
